document.full_text: a lab technician convicted of killing a yale university student, whose body was found stuffed behind a wall on the day she was to be married, was sentenced to 44 years in prison on friday at an emotionally wrenching court hearing.
document.title: killer of yale student sentenced to 44 years in prison
lines_and_colors: a lab technician convicted of killing a yale university student, whose body was found stuffed behind a wall on the day she was to be married, was sentenced to 44 years in prison on friday at an emotionally wrenching court hearing.
